mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, email, avatar, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, role, display_name AS displayName FROM user
SELECT id, username, password, email, avatar, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, role, display_name AS displayName FROM user WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, email, avatar, role, display_name, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{avatar}, #{role}, #{displayName}, NOW(), NOW())
